title: 'Penny Dreadful' Is Wonderful, But 'Rosemary's Baby' Is Dreadful
teaser: Critic David Bianculli reviews the two new TV programs in the horror genre competing for viewers and attention: NBC's modern-day remake of Rosemary's Baby and Showtime's Victorian Penny Dreadful.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
